## Public Member Functions

### convertToErrorCode() {#a67eecd6b929032f759330ed4c06ff91f}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;typename T&gt;</>}
  prototype={<>std::error&#95;code llvm::mca::InstructionError&lt; T &gt;::convertToErrorCode () const</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Convert this error to a std::error&#95;code.

This is a temporary crutch to enable interaction with code still using std::error&#95;code. It will be removed in the future.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mca/support-h/#l00038">38</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mca/support-h">Support.h</a>.
